bug.author: PingjunChen
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>üêõ AttributeError: 'VariationalStrategy' object has no attribute 'size'</denchmark-h>
I tried to follow the tutorial Simple_GP_Classification.ipynb in gpytorch/examples/02_Simple_GP_Classification/ and copied the code to my script to run. I came across the problem of using VariationalStrategy. <denchmark-h:h2>To reproduce</denchmark-h>
** Code snippet to reproduce ** import math import torch import gpytorch from gpytorch.models import VariationalGP from gpytorch.variational import CholeskyVariationalDistribution from gpytorch.variational import VariationalStrategy
train_x = torch.linspace(0, 1, 10) train_y = torch.sign(torch.cos(train_x * (4 * math.pi))).add(1).div(2)
class GPClassificationModel(VariationalGP): def __init__(self, train_x): variational_distribution = CholeskyVariationalDistribution(train_x.size(0)) variational_strategy = VariationalStrategy(self, train_x, variational_distribution) super(GPClassificationModel, self).__init__(variational_strategy) self.mean_module = gpytorch.means.ConstantMean() self.covar_module = gpytorch.kernels.ScaleKernel(gpytorch.kernels.RBFKernel())
def forward(self, x): mean_x = self.mean_module(x) covar_x = self.covar_module(x) latent_pred = gpytorch.distributions.MultivariateNormal(mean_x, covar_x) return latent_pred
# Initialize model and likelihood model = GPClassificationModel(train_x) ** Stack trace/error message ** <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/pingjun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/gpytorch/module.py", line 291, in __getattr__ return super().__getattribute__(name) AttributeError: 'VariationalStrategy' object has no attribute 'size'
During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
Traceback (most recent call last): File "cls_sin.py", line 36, in <module> model = GPClassificationModel(train_x) File "cls_sin.py", line 24, in __init__ super(GPClassificationModel, self).__init__(variational_strategy) File "/home/pingjun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/gpytorch/models/variational_gp.py", line 15, in __init__ variational_distribution = CholeskyVariationalDistribution(train_input.size(0)) File "/home/pingjun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/gpytorch/module.py", line 293, in __getattr__ raise e File "/home/pingjun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/gpytorch/module.py", line 288, in __getattr__ return super().__getattr__(name) File "/home/pingjun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 585, in __getattr__ type(self).__name__, name)) AttributeError: 'VariationalStrategy' object has no attribute 'size' </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>System information</denchmark-h>
GPyTorch Version: 0.3.6 PyTorch Version: 1.3.1 Computer OS: ubuntu 16.04 LTS
